extension.dc:title: Darwin Core Resource Relationship
extension.name: ResourceRelationship
extension.dc:description: Support for generic resource rleations according to Darwin Core terms.

property.name: resourceRelationshipID
property.dc:description: An identifier for an instance of relationship between one resource (the subject) and another (relatedResource, the object).

property.name: relatedResourceID
property.dc:description: An identifier for a related resource (the object, rather than the subject of the relationship).

property.name: relationshipOfResource
property.dc:description: The relationship of the resource identified by relatedResourceID to the subject (optionally identified by the resourceID). Recommended best practice is to use a controlled vocabulary.
property.examples: duplicate of", "mother of", "endoparasite of", "host to", "sibling of", "valid synonym of", "located within"

property.name: relationshipAccordingTo
property.dc:description: The source (person, organization, publication, reference) establishing the relationship between the two resources.

property.name: relationshipEstablishedDate
property.dc:description: The date-time on which the relationship between the two resources was established. Recommended best practice is to use an encoding scheme, such as ISO 8601:2004(E).

property.name: relationshipRemarks
property.dc:description: Comments or notes about the relationship between the two resources.
property.examples: mother and offspring collected from the same nest

property.name: scientificName
property.dc:description: A taxon name that is the object (relatedResource) of an association with the subject (either a taxon or a taxon occurrence)
